body_html:
Thanks!
I also noticed this when I tried to reproduce the problem with cuda-gdb, but didn't actually end up in a kernel.
I had assumed that the kernel launch would be automatically handled by the framework (e.g. in TensorExecutor)
I can add the launch in a new PR to eigen.

body:
Thanks!
I also noticed this when I tried to reproduce the problem with `cuda-gdb`, but didn't actually end up in a kernel.
I had assumed that the kernel launch would be automatically handled by the framework (e.g. in `TensorExecutor`)
I can add the launch in a new PR to eigen.
